mapper.select: select * from list where ${field} like '%${query}%' order by listId desc limit #{offset}, #{size}
select count(*) from list where ${field} like '%${query}%'
select count(*) from listlike where listId = #{id}
mapper.update: update list set listTitle = #{listTitle}, listContent = #{listContent} where listId = #{listId}
mapper.insert: insert into list(listTitle, listContent, userId) values(#{listTitle}, #{listContent}, #{userId})
insert into comment(commentContent, userId, listId) values(#{commentContent}, #{userId}, #{listId})
